title: pritam breaths
text: ‚≠ê 1/5 ‚Äî Groww: When Your Money Gets Trapped and No One Cares I‚Äôve been a loyal user of Groww since October 2019, and I say this with deep frustration‚ÄîGroww is now a disgrace to the very idea of user-first investing. üîê Mutual Funds Forced into Demat Mode ‚Äî Without Consent Groww has unilaterally converted my mutual fund holdings to demat mode without my knowledge or approval. This isn't just a backend change‚Äîit impacts how you redeem, adds unwanted complexity, and disconnects you from the AMC.
author: pritam breaths
